snippet: An advisory group said to focus on systems and circuits involving thousands to millions of brain cells, not the entire brain or individual cells and molecules.
abstract: Advisory group recommends that main target of research by National Institutes of Health for Pres Obama's Brain Initiative should be systems and circuits involving thousands to millions of brain cells, not the entire brain or individual cells and molecules.
lead_paragraph: An advisory group said to focus on systems and circuits involving thousands to millions of brain cells, not the entire brain or individual cells and molecules.

headline.main: Initial Focus of Research in Brain Project Is Chosen
headline.print_headline: Initial Focus of Research In Brain Project Is Chosen
